product_name: Lole Argentina Tankini Swim Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Lole Argentina Tankini top flatters your figure with its fluid cut and supportive underwires. Pair it with your favorite swimming bottoms and go get some well-deserved beach time!
